messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mech Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Robotics Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.
